Texts.Chs: 训练时间到！只要你你将你的能力锻炼至巅峰，我会尝试让新星足够强大来匹配你！^white;
Texts.Eng: Time to train! When you have perfected your abilities, I will attempt to make Nova strong enough to match!^white;

Texts.Chs: 你已经尽你所能的变得睿智了！我已经升级了你的新星。你现在也可以在升级后的铁砧上制造起原新星了。
Texts.Eng: You're as intelligent as you can be! I have upgraded your Nova. You will now also be able to build Primed Nova in an upgraded anvil.
